data.title: Web3 Foundation
data.description: Web3 Foundation Nurtures and stewards technologies and applications in the fields of decentralized web software protocols

data.title: Chainlink
data.description: Chainlink is the most widely used oracle network for powering hybrid smart contracts, enabling any blockchain to securely access off-chain data & computations.

data.title: Solana
data.description: Solana is a high-performance blockchain supporting builders around the world creating crypto apps that scale today.

data.title: Polkadot
data.description: Polkadot empowers blockchain networks to work together under the protection of shared security.

data.title: Darwinia
data.description: Darwinia Network is a decentralized cross-chain bridge network building on Substrate, which is the “Golden Gate Bridge” of the cross-chain ecology. It provides the safest general bridge solution, connecting Polkadot, Ethereum, TRON and other heterogeneous chains by cross-chain assets transfer and general remote chain call. Also, its main application areas include Defi, cross-chain NFT trading market, games, etc.

data.title: Moonbeam
data.description: Moonbeam is a new Polkadot smart contract platform that makes it easy to build natively interoperable blockchain applications.

data.title: HydraDX
data.description: Cross-chain liquidity protocol built on substrate

data.title: Edgeware Builders Guild
data.description: Edgeware gives blockchain developers an easy-to-use framework to build governance focused smart contracts.

data.title: Crust Network
data.description: CRUST implements the incentive layer protocol for decentralized storage. It is adaptable to multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and provides support for the application layer.

data.title: Astar
data.description: Astar is the Polkadot-native dApp hub supporting Ethereum, WebAssembly, dApp Staking, and Layer2 solutions.
